bugs.summary: White-space disappears when you type `Enter` before ASCII white-space
Make methods in `WhiteSpaceVisibilityKeeper` track DOM points in smaller block as far as possible
Push API should use the Permission spec's PermissionState enum
Do not throw a (non-standardized) exception when doing window.print() while unloading or non-fully-active
Make MOZ_PROFILER_STARTUP_ENTRIES understand sizes with units, e.g. "64MB"
Allow ToResultInvoke to return other nsresult like error types
Smooth scroll animations are reset when scrollTop is changed
Allow ToResult(const QMResult& aValue) and ToResult(QMResult&& aValue) to return other nsresult like error types
Change QM_TO_RESULT to use generic ToResult function
Update MDN compat data (2021 Nov 2nd week)
xulstore is keeping a quasi history via place: and find: urls in RDF:about attributes
All tabs gone, about:newtab blank, about:support without values (Browser Console: "TypeError: PlacesUtils.obfuscateUrlForXulStore is not a function BrowserGlue.jsm:3342:36")
Turn off MR2 onboarding in Fx95
Fix More From Mozilla icon size inside about:preferences
